name: 英語發音（二）
restrict: ◎必須先修過【ENU0281  英語發音（一）】 ◎課程開放上修
goals: To help students improve their pronunciation of the English language as they speak it.
To help students become conscious of their pronunciation problems.
To help students adopt the most efficient way to solve the pronounciation problems
syllabus:
Orientation, Unit 11   
Units 12,13  
Units 14,15   
Units 16,17, 18  
Units 32, 33   
Units 34, 35   
Units 36, 37  
Review   
Mid-term Exam  
Units 19, 20   
Units 21, 22  
Units 23, 24   
Units 25, 26   
No Class.  
Units 38, 39   
Units 40, 41  
Units 42, 43   
Final Exam
prerequisite: Prerequisite course: 【ENU0281  English Pronunciation (I)】 ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
